name: op_full
attributes: # [doc = " Fully checked: both owner and signer enforced by Anchor"]
body: let vault = & mut ctx . accounts . vault_account ;
* * vault . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? = (* * vault . to_account_info () . try_borrow_lamports () ?) + amount ;
msg ! ("op_full applied: {} lamports" , ** vault . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow ()) ;

name: op_partial
attributes: # [doc = " Partially checked: signer is checked, but owner check is omitted"]
body: let vault_info = & mut ctx . accounts . vault_info ;
msg ! ("op_partial applied (no owner check): {} lamports" , ** vault_info . try_borrow_lamports () ?) ;

name: op_none
attributes: # [doc = " No checks at all: fully vulnerable"]
body: let vault_info = & mut ctx . accounts . vault_info ;
msg ! ("op_none applied (no checks): {} lamports" , ** vault_info . try_borrow_lamports () ?) ;

fields.name: authority
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , signer)] # [doc = " The current authority must sign"]

fields.name: vault_info
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: raw account info, no owner/program-id validation"]

fields.name: authority
fields.attribute: # [account (signer)] # [doc = " We do check that authority has signed, but skip owner check"]

fields.name: vault_info
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: completely unchecked AccountInfoâ€”no signer or owner validation"]
